comments.comment: What type of hdmi does it have ? 2.1 X 2 or hdmi 2.0 X2? On the graphic is 2.1, but in spec 2.0

IPASON Yao Q27S monitor is equipped with two HDMI 2.1 ports and two DisplayPort 1.4 ports, ensuring compatibility with high-resolution and high-refresh-rate content, allowing you to easily enjoy a clear and smooth multimedia and gaming experience.
